thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 12 of 171
thread.title: Tina

author: Tina
title: Tina
text:
I can not put in words how happy I am to have found this site!
It is the perfect combination of my two most favorite things in the world - pets and traveling. In addition, I meet fantastic, like-minded people who end up turning into friends. I think I can honestly say I am addicted!
Can´t wait for my next sit! It´s all so easy and fun! Haven´t had a bad experience yet and don´t expect to.
